params._defaultRollupChainId: - the chainId of the rollup that Ether will be sent to by default                                when entering the rollup via fallback() or receive() fns.

enter(uint256,address).custom:emits: Enter indicating the amount of Ether to mint on the rollup & its recipient.

params.rollupRecipient: - The recipient of the Ether on the rollup.

params.amount: - The amount of tokens entering the rollup.
params.rollupRecipient: - The recipient of tokens on the rollup.
params.token: - The host chain address of the token entering the rollup.

enterTransact(uint256,address,address,by.custom:emits: Transact indicating the transaction to mine on the rollup.
enterTransact(uint256,address,address,by.details: Enter and Transact are processed after normal rollup block execution.See `enter` for Enter docs.

params.data: - The data to send to the rollup.
params.gas: - The gas limit for the transaction.
params.maxFeePerGas: - The maximum fee per gas for the transaction (per EIP-1559).
params.rollupChainId: - The rollup chain to send the transaction to.
params.to: - The address to call on the rollup.
params.value: - The amount of Ether to send on the rollup.

transact(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,u.details: Transaction is processed after normal rollup block execution.See `enterTransact` for docs.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).details: Only the admin can call this function.

canEnter(address).notice: tokenAddress => whether new EnterToken events are currently allowed for that token.

configureEnter(address,bool).notice: Alow/Disallow a given ERC20 token to enter the rollup.

defaultRollupChainId().notice: The chainId of rollup that Ether will be sent to by default when entering the rollup via fallback() or receive().

enter(address).notice: Allows native Ether to enter the default rollup.

enter(uint256,address).notice: Allows native Ether to enter the rollup.

enterToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows ERC20 tokens to enter the default rollup.

enterToken(uint256,address,address,uint2.notice: Allows ERC20 tokens to enter the rollup.

enterTransact(uint256,address,address,by.notice: Send Ether on the rollup, send a special transaction to be sent to the rollup with sender == L1 msg.sender.

tokenAdmin().notice: The address that is allowed to withdraw funds from the contract.

transact(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,u.notice: Allows a special transaction to be sent to the rollup with sender == L1 msg.sender.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows the admin to withdraw ETH or ERC20 tokens from the contract.
